abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column warns famine is looming in South Sudan that could rival horrors last seen in 1988; argues that key solution, rather than food shipments, is international diplomatic push to end nation's brutal civil war; calls on Pres Obama to take lead.
lead_paragraph: There’s a looming famine in South Sudan. What’s needed most isn’t food, but an end to the civil war.

headline.main: Starvation as a Product of War
headline.print_headline: Starvation as a Product of War

snippet: There’s a looming famine in South Sudan. What’s needed most isn’t food, but an end to the civil war.
